00044 void
00045 BlockCompressionCodecNone::deflate(const DynamicBuffer &input, DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header, size_t reserve) {
00046   output.clear();
00047   output.reserve(header.length() + input.fill() + reserve);
00048 
00049   header.set_compression_type(NONE);
00050   memcpy(output.base+header.length(), input.base, input.fill());
00051   header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00052   header.set_data_zlength(input.fill());
00053   header.set_data_checksum(fletcher32(output.base + header.length(), header.get_data_zlength()));
00054 
00055   output.ptr = output.base;
00056   header.encode(&output.ptr);
00057   output.ptr += header.get_data_zlength();
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00064 void
00065 BlockCompressionCodecNone::inflate(const DynamicBuffer &input, DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header) {
00066 
00067   const uint8_t *msg_ptr = input.base;
00068   size_t remaining = input.fill();
00069 
00070   header.decode(&msg_ptr, &remaining);
00071 
00072   if (header.get_data_zlength() != remaining)
00073     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Block decompression error, "
00074               "header zlength = %lu, actual = %lu",
00075               (Lu)header.get_data_zlength(), (Lu)remaining);
00076 
00077   uint32_t checksum = fletcher32(msg_ptr, remaining);
00078   if (checksum != header.get_data_checksum())
00079     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_CHECKSUM_MISMATCH, "Compressed block "
00080               "checksum mismatch header=%lx, computed=%lx",
00081               (Lu)header.get_data_checksum(), (Lu)checksum);
00082 
00083   output.reserve(header.get_data_length());
00084 
00085   memcpy(output.base, msg_ptr, header.get_data_length());
00086   output.ptr = output.base + header.get_data_length();
00087 }
